channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Vantara -- Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Vantara -- Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics

item.title: CVE-2023-3517|2024-08-02T06:55:03.685Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 9.5.0.1 and 9.3.0.5, including 8.3.x does not restrict JNDI identifiers during the creation of XActions, allowing control of system level data sources.

item.title: CVE-2023-5617|2024-02-28T22:30:40.128Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.6, including 9.5.x and 8.3.x, display the version of Tomcat when a server error is encountered.

item.title: CVE-2023-5617|2024-08-02T08:07:32.308Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.6, including 9.5.x and 8.3.x, display the version of Tomcat when a server error is encountered.
